text: Audu Bako Zoological Garden (also known as Audu Bako Zoo) is a Zoological Garden in Kano, Nigeria. The garden has over 70 species (different kind of animals). == Biography == The garden was established in 1971 by the past military administrator, Audu Bako. == References == Category:Zoos Category:1971 establishments in Africa Category:1970s establishments in Nigeria Category:Buildings and structures in Nigeria Category:Organizations based in Nigeria
title: Audu Bako Zoological Garden
